MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark, affecting properties in Bannatyne Street and surrounding areas. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed 3rd party damage to an underground cable on Ladyacre Road. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.59pm on Tuesday 16th March 2021
